name: Angewomon
description: Angewomon is a tall, slender, woman-like Digimon with fair skin, long blonde hair, and a silver helmet like that of Angemon . Its outfit is a skin-tight, white bodysuit that covers half of its body with white high heels, and it wears the Ten'ne characteristic of Tennin . It has eight white, dove-like wings with four on either side. Angewomon wears a Holy Ring on its left ankle and the DigiCode on both the Holy Ring and the ends of its ten'ne reads デジタルモンスター ( デジタルモンスター , Dejitaru Monsutā ? , lit. "Digital Monster") . Angewomon is frequently depicted wearing lipstick.
